H0.text: what are the seven nations of central america. Belize

H1.text: what are the seven nations of central america. Costa Rica

H2.text: what are the seven nations of central america. El Salvador

H3.text: what are the seven nations of central america. Panama

A4.text: Central America is usually defined as consisting of seven countries: Belize, Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras, Nicaragua, and Panama.

A5.text: Panama is located at the southern end of Central America
